title: Naturopathic Doctor San Luis Obispo California
description: Naturopathic Medicine and holistic care in San Luis Obispo - including Arroyo Grande, Pismo Beach, Morro Bay, Paso Robles, Cambria, Avila
cleaned_text: San Luis Obispo, California Purist Natural Medicine has a location in San Luis Obispo, however we provide naturopathic medical services to the entire Central Coast area including Santa Barbara. In addition, we provide telemedicine to residents of California state-wide. For our San Luis Obispo patients, Dr. Perrine is located in Arroyo Grande at 411 Traffic Way Suite E, Arroyo Grande. Appointments can be scheduled as in-person or telehealth. At Purist Natural Medicine we are constantly seeking emerging techniques and methods to support you and help you attain the highest level of health and wellness possible, given your unique situation and health goals. We provide natural, personalized medicine and solutions for patients in San Luis Obispo and surrounding areas: Arroyo Grande, Pismo Beach, Morro Bay, Atascadero, Paso Robles, Cambria.
